meaningMnemonic: Throw a <radical>drunkard</radical> in a cage with a <radical>tiger</radical> and some <radical>spikes</radical> and the tiger will have the time of its life <kanji>play</kanji>ing with them! Think of all the tiger play time possibilities!
readingMnemonic: If you aren't the tiger, watching it <kanji>play</kanji> is a little like watching someone's head get cut off with a <reading>gui</reading>llotine (ぎ). In fact, you don't want to watch it play at all anymore.
